title: [Large-Scale] Mobile-Assisted Collaborative Language Learning Simulation Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic foreign language grammar and vocabulary
context.additional_context: Offers a language practice environment based on real-life scenarios using VR devices

learning_goals: Learners can perform basic daily conversations (greetings, ordering, navigation, etc.) in the target language within a VR simulation environment.
Learners can communicate with over 80% accuracy through collaborative tasks (role-play, quiz-solving) using mobile devices.
Learners can share language learning materials with peers and provide feedback using digital resources at least once a week.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
